description: Select nice ripe red tomatoes. The ones still on the vine are ideal.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: Creamy Tomato Mascarpone Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 cloves fresh garlic, chopped or minced
handful fresh basil, chopped or torn

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil and cook the pasta spirals until al dente using the packet instructions. Then drain and set aside.

While the pasta is cooking, in a non-stick pan add all of the diced tomatoes, Italian herbs and chopped garlic and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and cook over a medium heat for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. You can cook this for much longer if you have time, as this will intensify the flavours, but if not 10 minutes will do.
Stir in the sugar and basil and continue cooking for a couple of minutes.
Stir in all of the mascarpone and mix well while still over the heat for about 2 minutes.
Add the pasta to the sauce in the pan. Mix to coat all the pasta. Remove from heat and serve.
